    • encodePassword

      public String encodePassword(CharSequence password)
      Encode the given password using the configured hashing algorithm.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to encrypt.
      Returns:
      The encrypted password.

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword(CharSequence rawPassword, Security security)
      Validates the password against the provided sec's stored password. If the password is valid and an upgrade is needed to the existing stored password, the stored password will be upgraded.
      Parameters:
      rawPassword - The password to validate.
      security - The sec object containing the stored password.

    • matchesPassword

      public boolean matchesPassword(CharSequence rawPassword, String encodedPassword)
      Validates the password against the provided encoded password.
      Parameters:
      rawPassword - The password to validate.
      encodedPassword - The encoded password to compare against.
      Returns:
      True if the password is valid, false otherwise.

    • upgradeSavePasswordHash

      public boolean upgradeSavePasswordHash(CharSequence rawPassword, Security security)
      Upgrades the password hash and saves the updated Security object.
      Parameters:
      rawPassword - The raw password to hash.
      security - The Security object to update.
      Returns:
      True if the password hash was successfully upgraded and saved, false otherwise.
